name: fastqe
description: Read one or more FASTQ files, compute quality stats for each file, print as emoji... for some reason.😄

options.description: show this help message and exit
Minimum length sequence to include in stats (default 0)
show program's version number and exit
use a mapping of custom emoji to quality in CUSTOM_DICT (🐍🌴)
Hide the header before sample output
write output to OUTPUT_FILE instead of stdout
enable long reads up to READ_LENGTH bp long
